description.en-us: The Panda Cooler A1 is a high-performance printhead upgrade for your Bambu Lab A1 or A1 mini. This plug-and-play accessory actively cools the stepper motor, reducing temperatures by 15-25°C to ensure reliable performance during long prints
description.zh-cn: Panda Cooler A1 是 Bambu Lab A1 或 A1 mini 的高性能喷头升级版。这款即插即用的配件可主动冷却步进电机，将温度降低 15-25°C 以确保长时间打印时的性能可靠。
